    • drawCard

      public void drawCard​(fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, CardData card, float x, float y, boolean color, boolean num, float width, float height)
      Draw cards without hide anything
      Parameters:
      context - contains the informations of the current graphic window
      card - a card with a Color and a number
      x - reference for the horizontal position of the left top corner boxes
      y - reference for the vertical position of the left top corner boxes
      color - a boolean to say if the color of the card is known
      num - a boolean to say if the number of the card is known
      width - the width of the game screen
      height - the height of the game screen
